metadata.name: T R U E Test Thin Layer Rapid Use Patch Test Patch
metadata.composition: p tert Butylphenol formaldehyde resin low molecular weight

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: P Tert Butylphenol Formaldehyde Resin Low Molecular Weight is approved for use within allergenic epicutaneous patch tests which are indicated for use as an aid in the diagnosis of allergic contact dermatitis ACD in persons 6 years of age and older
